Keywords: Mystical , Scientist , Warp World , Weapon X
Real Name: Herbert Blackheart Wyndham
Special Powers
TARGETING: Elevated, Hindering, Characters
TO ENGINEER THE PERFECT WORLD: Herbert Blackheart Wyndham can use the standard powers printed on his card for lower click numbers.
OCCULT DEALINGS: Herbert Blackheart Wyndham isn't a standard character. // Herbert Blackheart Wyndham takes a maximum of 1 damage from attacks, can't be healed, and can't be chosen for Mastermind. Protected: Pulse Wave.

POINTS.[/QUOTE] For me, the issue is that he is a low priority figure that nobody will go after until he’s the very last character on your force. On click 1 all he does is provide smoke cloud and prob con. With 9 attack and 1 damage, I just can’t see anyone attacking him. Plus, with pushing damage gone you’re gonna have a really hard time getting him to other clicks. EDIT: Actually, with the ultimate nullifier he can be pretty darn good actually.
